overview:
Gamification Fanatic, Marketing expert, proud DMOZ and Wikipedia editor, and social media observer. Recently.. premium olive oil collector.

Fotis has a wide experience of the Greek market, focusing mostly on the Leisure Industry (Gaming and Gambling/Entertainment). He developed a series of gamification projects or game competitions for a series of websites.

Fotis acted as consultant, on companies such as Vista Research, a Standard and Poor’ s company, or the Gerson Lehrman Group, assisted several start-ups, and now heads a company, Web Works, that offers secondary Value Added services (mainly sports databases), to enhance customer usability and retention to users.

As most Greeks, Fotis is an olive oil fanatic. So, he founded OliveShop (www.OliveShop.com), an online boutique that collects ultra premium olive products, such as organic extra virgin olive oils, olives and natural organic olive cosmetics.

Fotis is keen domain collector, with one of the most valuable domain databases in Greece.
